      • filter

        public static java.lang.String filter(Dataset dataset,
                                      java.lang.String idx_remove,
                                      java.lang.String scale,
                                      java.lang.String translation,
                                      java.lang.Boolean standardize,
                                      java.lang.Boolean ignore,
                                      java.lang.String attributeRange,
                                      java.lang.String accept,
                                      java.lang.String uri)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        WEKA filter methods
        Parameters:
        dataset - dataset/mongodb id
        idx_remove - attributes to remove (comma seperated String)
        scale - factor for scaling the output range
        translation - translation of the output range
        standardize - null/true Standardizes all numeric attributes in the given dataset to have zero mean and unit variance
        ignore - ignore the class attribute for standardize
        attributeRange - range (comma separated list) of string attributes to convert to nominal
        accept - requested mime-type
        uri - URI of the dataset
        Returns:
        filtered arff string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exceptions
